definition: to halt/to stay/to be stationed (of troops, diplomats etc)
abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)

sentences.english: Many house restaurants and fancy guesthouses.
sentences.chinese: 許多駐京辦都配備賓館和豪華的會客室。

sentences.english: In 2002 the director of Hebei province’s office was sentenced to life in jail.
sentences.chinese: 2002年，河北省駐京辦主任被判監禁。

sentences.english: In 2002 the director of Hebei province's office was sentenced to life in jail.
sentences.chinese: 2002年，河北省駐京辦主任被判處終身監禁。

sentences.english: So American media based in Beijing contribute an important role in reporting the China-related issue.
sentences.chinese: 美國駐京媒體在涉華報道領域有着舉足輕重的作用。

sentences.english: His fictional accounts of the shenanigans in representative offices rang all too true.
sentences.chinese: 在小說中他揭露了許多駐京辦的醜惡事實。

sentences.english: The offices have been involved in a series of corruption scandals in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，駐京辦涉及到一系列腐敗醜聞。
